name: Butterfly
description:
Butterfly connects Dynamo to OpenFOAM for CFD simulation. Follow the direction on this page for installation:

https://github.com/ladybug-tools/butterfly/wiki/Getting-started-with-butterfly-in-dynamo

There are two example files under extra/examplefiles that you can use to get yourself familiarized with the process. There will be more documentation and tutorials available soon. Open an issue on GitHub for wishes and bugs!
contents:
blockMesh - blockMesh
-, Boundary - Create a custom boundary.
-, calculated - calculated boundary condition.
-, chekMesh - chekMesh
-, controlDict - Set parameters for runDict, Create Butterfly Geometry - Create Butterfly surface.
-, Create Case from Folder - Create an OpenFOAM Case from an existing case in a local folder.
-, Create Case from Geometries - Create an OpenFOAM Case from geometries.
-, Create Case from Tunnel - Create Case from wind tunnel.
-, decomposeParDict scotch - Scotch decomposeParDict. Dictionary for parallel runs.
-, decomposeParDict simple - Simple decomposeParDict. Dictionary for parallel runs.
-, DistanceRefinementMode - Inside/Ouside region refinement.
-, divSchemes library - Generate fvSchemes based on mesh non-orthogonalities.
-, epsilonWallFunction - epsilonWallFunction boundary condition.

-, Function Object - Function Object., FvSchemes from Non-orthogonality - Generate fvSchemes based on mesh non-orthogonalities.
-, Get Geometry - Update fvSchemes values based on mesh orthogonalities.
-, Grading XYZ - MultiGrading
Create a grading for multiple segmentGradings.
-, Heat Transfer Recipe - Heat Transfer Recipe.
-, Inlet Boundary - Create an inlet boundary with uniform velocity value.
-, Inlet Flow-Rate Boundary - Create an inlet boundary with flow rate in m3/s.
-, kqRWallFunction - kqRWallFunction boundary condition.
-, Laminar Turbulance Model - Large eddy simulation (LES) modelling.
Read more: http://cfd.direct/openfoam/user-guide/turbulence/
Watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eu_4ppppQmw, LES Turbulance Model - Large eddy simulation (LES) modelling.
Read more: http://cfd.direct/openfoam/user-guide/turbulence/
Watch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eu_4ppppQmw, Load Mesh - Load mesh from the case for preview.
-, Load Points - Load points from the case for preview.
-, Load Probes Value - Load results for a field in probes.
-, Load Probes - Load probes from a folder.
-, Load Skipped Probes - Load results for a field in probes.
-, LocationRefinementMode - Inside/Ouside region refinement.
-, Look Up Case Folder - Look Up Case Folder.
-, Make2d Parameters - Make a case 2d., Meshing Parameters - Set meshing parameters for blockMesh and snappyHexMesh., MultiGrading - MultiGrading

-, nutkWallFunction - nutkWallFunction boundary condition.

-, probes - Create Butterfly probes, purgeCase - Purge case folder.
-, RAS Turbulance Model - Reynolds-averaged simulation (RAS) turbulence model.

-, Update blockMeshDict - Update blockMeshDict.
-, Visualize Vectors - Visualize vectors, Wall Boundary - Create a wall boundary.
